title: WTT: my Sovereign 460 for your EPDG
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: my Sovereign 460 for your EPDG
posts.post_content:
Mine are all lower grade, but that's what I'm looking for in return.  Here's my (short) list.  All are raw, any grade is from the cracked holder:
  * Devore (SGC A)
  * Gandil (SGC10)
  * Geyer 
  * Hummel (PSA1.5)
  * Schlei Batting (SGC10)
  * Schlei Portrait (SGC A)
  * Tannehill no 'L'
